name: Tube Fashion and Beauty Vlogger
description:
Tube Fashion and Beauty Video Blogger is a free mobile game created especially for girls to show their top trending fashion style to the world. Every girl wants to get famous on social media and want to show her new and stylish outlook to the world. These girls have started a video fashion channel to post some crazy and stylish outfits, makeup and makeover ideas. They get a Tube channel and give an attractive name. They are posting their shopping, makeup, concert and dancing videos to get more popularity on the internet.



DANCING VIDEOS:
All girls can dance and its easy to learn. Practice moving your hips clockwise forward and backward. Make the eye contact and smile, the guys are kind of nervous and it helps them to feel confident and comfortable. Girls can try different dancing types like hip hop dance, tap dance, yangko dance, belly dance, gingham style, break dance, ballet, salsa, or line dance and then post these famous steps on your video blogger to get likes and appreciations.

SHOPPING TIME:
You can choose the best and new trending styles which are more fashionable. Just pull out the clothes which appeal your eyes. You can look for the classic styles. Closely check for the stains, tears, mended parts and stretched stitching and marks. Only choose the best available fashion and then post it to your tube vlogger to get popularity.

MAKEUP :
Every girl wants to have some stylish and trending makeup from her makeup kit. So girls need to choose and purchase only the gorgeous and quality branded makeup. There are different makeup types for face like Face Primer, Concealer, Foundation, Face powder, BB Cream, Rouge, blush or blusher, cheek colouring, Contour powder/creams, Highlight.


CONCERT:
There is a fashion concert for girls inside the city and girls are going to perform and participate. Audience will appreciate the efforts by girls and then girls has to post their videos on their tube vlogger to get more likes and popularity.

DRESSUP:
Dress up these cute girls with many dresses, earring, headbands, shoes and necklaces and then post the dressed picture on social media as well as on this beauty tube fashion vlogger channel.



Do not forget to play all of our other makeup, makeover, cooking, tailoring, babies and dress up games for girls and kids.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces!
